```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
bgg_data <- read_csv2("data/bgg_dataset.csv") |> clean_names()
```
```{r}
bgg_data |>
  group_by(domains) |>
  summarize(count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))
```


```{r}
bgg_data |>
  group_by(domains) |>
  summarize(average = mean(rating_average)) |>
  arrange(desc(average))
